item.title: Understanding x86_64 Paging - zolutal’s blog
item.description: I’ve spent quite a lot of time messing with x86_64 page tables, understanding address translation is not easy and when I started learning about it I felt like a lot of the material out there on how it works was hard for me to wrap my head around.
